long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
ReCracked Browser Extension: Master Leetcode with Spaced Repetition

Overview
ReCracked enhances your coding skills by integrating with LeetCode to track your practice sessions and schedule problem reviews using spaced repetition. This method helps solidify coding techniques and problem-solving patterns, making each practice session more effective—ideal for both seasoned developers and students.

Key Features

	•	Automatic tracking of solved LeetCode problems.
	•	Spaced repetition scheduling to optimize review times.
	•	Analytics to monitor improvements and focus areas.

Benefits

	•	Enhanced Memory Retention: Revisit problems at calculated intervals to improve recall.
	•	Optimized Interview Preparation: Regular practice of solved problems aids in recall during interviews.
	•	Efficient Study Time Utilization: Focus on areas that need improvement, not what you already know.
	•	Progress Tracking: Quantitative insights help guide your study focus.

How to Use ReCracked

	1.	Register: Create a free account at www.recracked.net.
	2.	Install: Add the ReCracked extension from the Chrome Web Store.
	3.	Log In: Access the extension via Chrome, and log in.
	4.	Solve: Practice on LeetCode and let ReCracked log and schedule reviews.
	5.	Review: Follow the extension’s prompts to review problems at optimal times.

Why ReCracked?

	•	Combat Forgetfulness: Use proven cognitive science techniques to reinforce learning.
	•	Maintain a Competitive Edge: Regular reviews keep your skills sharp.
	•	Seamless Integration: Works in the background without disrupting your usual LeetCode sessions.

Get Started

	•	Register at www.recracked.net.
	•	Install the extension from the Chrome Web Store.
	•	Begin your structured practice and let ReCracked streamline your path to mastery.

Download ReCracked Today!
